_header: In a pleasant arbor very quaint and quadrant
Subjects: advice; counsel; virtues; contemporary conditions; evils of the times
_description: ‘Vice through violence puttyth vertue vnto flyte’ — twelve 8-line stanzas with this refrain

VandADyce45.First Lines:
In a plesante arboure very queynte & quadranteWith borders
                    bewtyfull vpon euery syde…
VandADyce45.Last Lines:
…then grace in shorte space no dowghter shall applyethat vertu
                    shall floresshe & putte vice vnto flyteffinis
